Clip.Title: SINGAPORE 1942 END OF EMPIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: This 2 Part Miniseries recounts how the British Colony of Singapore was systematically surrounded and crushed by the Japanese Empire in World War II.

Clip.Title: SPITFIRE SISTERS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Meet the remarkable ladies who flew for the Air Transport Auxiliary in World War II. Now in their 90's, these ladies tell us of the adventures they experienced during their incredible lives as Ferry Pilots.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An east coast shipper creates a private naval fleet to seize American ships.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Eastern Coastline of Nova Scotia is a living historical record of the centuries-old battle between the French and the English in the New World, along one of the Atlantic's most remote, hostile coastlines.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: TANK ON THE MOON
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Revealing near-lost stories about Soviet-made robots that patrolled the Lunar surface in the 1970s.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Christian Peacemaker Father Bob Holmes travels to Colombia where he becomes a human shield for the new union leader.

Clip.Title: EXTREME CLERGY
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Rev Sharon Ruiz-Duremdes' mission is to find replacements for murdered Filipino clergy before she, herself, is killed.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Cuba by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: THE AMAZON CODE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Once Missionary Daniel Everett met the Piraha tribe, it wasn't the word of God he was interested in spreading. Instead, Everett spent over 30 years trying to decipher their strange language and inadvertently propelled himself into linguistic fame and controversy.

Clip.Title: AMYU: THE ARMY OF THE WASP MEN
Clip.Episode: Amyu: The Army of Wasp Men
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Amazon forest, two young Kayapo boys must undergo a terrible initiatory ordeal of striking a wasp's nest, thereby provoking a violent wasp attack, in order to become strong and brave Kayapo warriors.
